name: Quanta Family Office
overview:
Quanta Family Office is a private organization that manages the investments and trusts for a cadre families with substantial capital. The organization participates in synergistic joint-ventures/partnerships with a syndicate of other family offices and venture partners. Our vested principal investments and dealings have been overseas. Our U.S. practice currently and primarily invests in deals that include but not limited to arbitrage, debt restructuring, venture debt/financing, bridge loans, private equity, leveraged buyouts, alternative energy, and early stage venture capital investments.

Quanta’s controlled source of capital allows us to invest without the timing and asset-class limitations of traditional private equity funds and permits us to be structurally flexible and agile.
